message.body: DYLAN did you survive the hurricane??

I am doing well and so is my family. I'm at my dorm and it is so much fun cuz we have no classes pretty much this week. NYC got obliterated though, like a lot of the subway in manhattan is completely flooded
How are you? I've also haven't seen you in a MMAADDDDD long time

That's good. I've seen pictures of the subway and the city flooded, it's terrible. Lucky that you don't have class! I know, it's been mad long! I'm doing good. I'm really enjoying college. How have you been??
I'm doing real well. College is very very fun and boredom is none existent. Your in Atlanta right?
That's great! Yeah I'm in Atlanta. It's a really cool place to be. The climate is pretty similar to New York and its very manageable.
